about_the_game:
Unleash Your VR Fists of Fury in a futuristic sport and become the FISTAGON Champion! 🏆

Choose your favourite national athlete and step into the gravity-defying arena of the FISTAGON-tournament!
Punch blocks into the grid creating epic combos and chase the high of high score!

🥊🥊 Energetic fist punching mechanics: Hit harder and hit accurately for best scores.
🌟 Varied Arenas: Conquer diverse grid-arenas with unique challenges.
💥 Special Blocks Galore: Face variety of special blocks like magnetic, explosive, shooting and others!
💪 Unique Characters: Choose your National Fister from variety of unique athletes.
🌐 Online Multiplayer Mayhem: Crush rivals in one-on-one showdowns. Your goal: drop opponents from their platforms with high-scoring combos. Challenge fisters worldwide!
🎮 Easy to Learn, Tough to Master: FISTAGON is accessible for all, but only the best rise to the top. Unlock powerful fist abilities and claim your spot on global leaderboards!
🏅 Compete, Conquer, and FISTAGON! Master the art of fistplay, dominate the tournament, and etch your name in FISTAGON history!

Get in the game – download FISTAGON now and become the VR champion!

Join Virtual Dawn Games Discord server for more info about our releases and the chance to influence the development of our titles.
https://discord.gg/39pXGj2c93

Unleash Your VR Fists of Fury in a futuristic sport and become the FISTAGON Champion! 🏆

Choose your favourite national athlete and step into the gravity-defying arena of the FISTAGON-tournament!
Punch blocks into the grid creating epic combos and chase the high of high score!

🥊🥊 Energetic fist punching mechanics: Hit harder and hit accurately for best scores.
🌟 Varied Arenas: Conquer diverse grid-arenas with unique challenges.
💥 Special Blocks Galore: Face variety of special blocks like magnetic, explosive, shooting and others!
💪 Unique Characters: Choose your National Fister from variety of unique athletes.
🌐 Online Multiplayer Mayhem: Crush rivals in one-on-one showdowns. Your goal: drop opponents from their platforms with high-scoring combos. Challenge fisters worldwide!
🎮 Easy to Learn, Tough to Master: FISTAGON is accessible for all, but only the best rise to the top. Unlock powerful fist abilities and claim your spot on global leaderboards!
🏅 Compete, Conquer, and FISTAGON! Master the art of fistplay, dominate the tournament, and etch your name in FISTAGON history!

name: FISTAGON

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Sandy Bridge or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR compatible devices except Windows Mixed Reality.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: FISTAGON, the fist-fighting sports extravaganza! Punch blocks, strategize combos, score big, and rise to the top of leaderboards with your favourite national FISTAGON athlete, or challenge friends and strangers to one vs one online match!
